# Overview 



# Libraries

```{r}
library(powerMediation)

```


# Analysis 

```{r}
y <- c(25L, 22L, 20L, 10L, 11L, 15L, 31L, 12L, 11L, 11L, 18L, 16L, 11L, 
       16L, 25L, 27L, 19L, 11L, 11L, 19L, 11L, 10L, 15L, 10L, 18L, 6L, 
       11L, 9L, 21L, 9L, 14L, 17L)
x <- seq(1:32)
stopifnot(length(x) == length(y))

m <- lm(y~x)

plot(x, y)
lines(y)
abline(m, col = "blue")

```


```{r}
var_y <- var(y)
sd_y <- sd(y)

var_x <- var(x)
sd_x <- sd(x)

power <- power.SLR(n=32, 
                   lambda.a = -0.2, 
                   sigma.x = sd_x, 
                   sigma.y = sd_y, 
                   alpha = .05, 
                   verbose = TRUE)
```
